select
, t.name as t_name from td_advertisement a left join td_adsense t on t.id= a.ads_id where 1=1
and a.status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
and a.ads_id = #{adsId,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by a.sort desc
order by a.sort asc
